name: Bernadette Chapple
text:
My husband and I have been patronizing Evening Out Formal Wear for over 25 years! They provide excellent customer service and quality tuxedos. As we celebrate our 25th Wedding Anniversary in the 26th year, there is only one tuxedo location we would trust with dressing the "Groom". Thank you Evening Out Formal Wear for being exceptional!

~Michael and Bernadette Chapple

name: Marc Wilder
text: Well my wedding day or these pics wouldn’t have been a success without Evening Out! Mr. Salter is top notch with customer service and his attention to the smallest details is the reason I would shop with him again! If any business owner is willing to give you their personal number to ensure your order is fulfilled is A1 in my book! GO DAWGS!

name: Grant Smith
text: Spectacular service, excellent clothing options from simple tuxedos to the more wild look.  Great prices and exceptional quality.  Will come back to evening out for any of my formal clothing needs!!

name: Harris Kenneth
text: Professional, friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable are the best ways I can describe the staff at “Evening Out”. Mr. Salter and his staff are tailored to making sure that you are stepping out in style for your event. My groomsmen and myself went there and thanks to the staff over there we came out looking good. 5/5 stars, highly recommended !!

name: Kierra Eleace
text: My husband and sons both got their suits for our wedding here. They looked amazing for our wedding day!!! The alterations were perfect!I would highly recommend Evening Out to everyone I need of prom or wedding attire.

name: Timothy Bibb
text: I want to start with about how good the customer service was. I forgot the man name but you will remember his face every time you come. He was honest and very nice. He know what you like and help a lot . I came to him my first time over a year ago and he remember his customers. Men warehouse stereotype me and I will never return plus Evening out got better choice with best prices.

name: Karl Cody
text: I was going to go to men’s warehouse where I was expecting to pay between 200$ and 250$ for a tux rental. Instead found Evening Out and not only did they beat the price they shattered the price and my expectations.  If you are looking for a tux rental for yourself or a wedding party this is the place to go no questions asked.  The owner is extremely courteous and knowledgeable on all things tuxedos.  You will be glad you went to Evening Out Formal Wear!

name: Nikki
text: We had such a great experience with our tux rental! Super helpful and friendly staff. I’m a procrastinator by nature so I was a little last minute but they had everything ready in time. I’ll definitely be using them in the future!

name: Kameron Bell
text: Mr. Salter was very nice throughout my whole wedding experience with ordering suits for my wedding. He has a lot of variety and will do same day alterations if needed. 10/10 recommend

name: Cedric Bennett
text: I definitely recommend anyone to come for your formal event . He really get the job done . Definitely left with a smile

name: Karen Stinson
text: Best customer service ever! I spoke with the owner a year before the wedding. 10 months later, I called back and he remembered our color scheme and my fiancé’s  name. If that’s not being attentive than I don’t know what is! Very pleased with the quality and service. We will be back!

name: Ariana Pitts
text: My dress was a very hard dress to find a tux for and this place was definitely amazing! My boyfriend found a suit to match my dress and I’m so in love I definitely recommend this place!!

name: Memendra Page
text: This is the place to go.. He has unique and tailored styles. He has a great selection to choose from. The location is in a good spot and the customer service was superb. There is no place like this.  The other shops are generic. The prices are reasonable and the quality is way better.

name: Josh summey
text: Had a great experience with this company! The guy who owns this spot is extremely friendly and is very quick on alterations and adjustments on suits

name: D Jackson
text: Great experience and even better service. I would recommend Evening Out to anyone who was looking for a tuxedo to rent.

name: Tomica Harris
text: Mr. Kim was amazing from the beginning to the end! He knows his stuff. On our wedding day, all the groomsmen were perfectly fitted and handsome. The groom, MY HUSBAND, was GQ fine standing at the altar. I highly recommend Evening Out Formal Wear and will definitely use them again.

name: Charles Mosely
text: Great experience! They really know what they are doing here! Grade A service, fast, and efficient. Show them what you want and they make it happen!

name: Gloria Hall
text: I highly recommend that you shop with Evening Out! I shopped with them for my son’s prom two years straight I would not go anywhere else! He has everything you need from head to toe! Don’t just shop for Prom any and all occasions! Nice friendly atmosphere!

name: Felix Allen
text: The best place to get your tuxedo in  the Montgomery area. Very friendly, professional and organize when it comes to your desire and look. Most shops have to send your tuxedo off if any problems occur, but evening out will fix it right away and have it right back in 10 mins. Keep up the great job and  greatly appreciate.  #theallens

name: Scoop Salter
text: I walked in and I Loved the atmosphere and the photos selection of all the suites to choose from! I would recommend anyone looking to be fitted for a special night out to make their choice at “EVENING OUT”

name: Brookelynn Smith
text: Great place! They were a ton of help for me and my groom throughout the entire processes. They even rushed the shipping for us so we could have the tuxedos a day early. Very happy with the service of the staff.

name: Krisstopher Floyd
text:
Great customer service, quality work family and friendly environment. If you are looking for a place for your wedding. Guys this is definitely the place to go.
Professional staff and excellent service.

name: andre mitchell
text: Absolutely a great business and is very patient with each and every customer. I highly recommend using Evening Out Formal Wear for your next event.

name: Jimmie Williams
text: Very nice tuxedo, great price, even great customer service. Evening out formal wear had me looking good for my wedding, for it to be last minute. Thank you.

name: Meryles Gilbert
text: Great prices and great customer service!! If you are getting married this is guy you need to call! Thanks again for everything!

name: Monique Young
text: We had such an amazing experience. Mr. Salter was very helpful, patient and accomadating! He went above and beyond with letting my fianc'e try on several sizes and fits to make sure we were satisfied with the total look and comfort of the tux! Anyone looking for formal men wear should definitely come here.

name: Jeramiya Kitchens
text: Best in the State!! I wish Mr. Salter had a shop in Auburn!! My groomsmen and I had no problems!!

name: Joe Gunn
text: Great service from Mr.Kim as usual!!! Evening Out is the place to go for your Tuxedo rental needs!!! I will be back!!

name: Brittney Jones
text: Perfect, Mr. Salter is so easy to work with, he offers great suggestions and he is the best.

name: Gerald Wells
text: This is a very good place to rent from.  Everytime I go there, they have me right.  They did my wedding and my wife and I was very pleased.  They recently fitted me for a suite for an event and they did a wonderful job.  Everyone in the store is very friendly.  This is the place to go.

name: Brandon Simmons
text: Kim and staff are amazing definitely would recommend anyone to them 😊 Great quality and great customer service 👍

name: Andrew Lee
text: Wish I could Add more Stars. The service that I receive from the staff was absolutely above and beyond.  Much better prices and service then the big other guys.

name: Shaunta' Scruggs
text: I am new to the area and was recommended to go this shop for our tux needs for our wedding. As any bride planning a wedding stress level was at 5000!! This wonderful place of business was able to bring me down to a ZERO and gave me ALL THE OPTIONS that I wanted for the look I needed for our wedding!!! NO BETTER PLACE TO GO FOR YOUR NEEDS WHEN IT COMES TO YOUR MAN LOOKING BEYOND AMAZING!!!! The even have a full invite and table at my wedding now!!! THANK YOU A MILLION!!

name: Kimberly Wright
text: Love this place! The owner was extremely polite and helpful when my date needed a tux at the last min. We’ll always go to them from now on.

name: Mo L
text: Best tux shop in Montgomery!

name: Ashley Ayers
text: Great experience! Nice, personable, professional & all around wonderful. Love supporting our hometown businesses.

name: Mark McGough
text: So friendly!! I needed a tux for my mother’s wedding and everyone at Evening Out was so accommodating and punctual. With all the selections they offer you’d be doing yourself a disservice if Evening Out isn’t your first call for all of your formal needs

name: Greg Jones
text: I received excellent customer service. Great selection to choose from, Mr. Salter helped me put together an awesome tux‼️

name: Tyrome Graham
text: It was great

name: jessica jackson
text: We used Evening Out Formal Wear to dress the men for my special day. They were wonderful and words cannot describe how impressed and grateful I am for their remarkable service. I would recommend them 10x over to anyone planning a wedding. Thank You! Thank You! Thank You! Evening Out Formal Wear you are amazing!

name: Laquetti Yelder
text: Evening out save my wedding because my grown is  a groomzilla!!!! They have the best suits and tuxedos At an amazing price

name: Timothy Reed
text: Great place to get your tuxes from not expensive and he offered altering plus he is a cool dude for real.

name: Rafael Mickle
text: Awesome service with great prices. Not to mention great and helpful the owner was.

name: Rodrick Grant
text: Made getting fitted for my tux very quick and easy. Measurements were precise and my tux fit great when it arrived. Wish I came here for my wedding 5 months ago.

name: Adrian Barris
text: Very nice and well ran . Great attitude and great customer service!! Best prices around !!

name: Dee Colley
text: Superb service, even though I waited until the last minute to finalize my tux they handled it well with no problem try them out 👍👍

name: Cornelius Moye
text: Great owner, great prices and even better selections to choose from.  They had exactly what I needed for my wedding and got me a great looking tux.

name: Tyrone E. Robinson
text: Great customer service!! Came through for me at the last minute. Rental prices were great. My go to place for all my formal events.

name: kenta B Grayson
text: I received great service from great professional people. I highly recommend this business to anyone in the surrounding areas, you will not be disappointed.

name: L C
text: I rode all over town trying to find a tuxedo for a Mardi Gras ball. Great place, Great People! Fast Friendly Service! No Hidden Fees! I Will Most Definitely Continue Doing Business Here!!!!! Thanks A Million!

name: Brianna Caldwell
text: Very nice and professional. They go over and beyond for the customers. They had what I wanted. Price is reasonable. I’m beyond pleased.

name: DeAngelo Hill
text: Great customer service at Evening Out Formal! Great prices to go along with a variety of tuxes you don't see anywhere else. I highly recommend Evening Out for all of your wedding, prom, or ball needs!!!

name: Lavoris Stinson
text: Excellent service. Friendly staff

name: freddie gray
text: The customer service was amazing and the prices were very reasonable. Mr.Salters was very helpful, knowledgeable, and professional. We will definitely be returning!!

name: Bob McGough
text: Very professional, great attitude, very welcoming. Tux fit perfectly. 10/10 will use again.

name: Derrell Nalls
text: Has sum great stuff. Even had sum blazers I've never seen before. Wish I was still goin to prom. This one of the places I definitely would consider

name: Google mail
text: Owner was very friendly and professional! Tuxedos were neat, clean and measured to the t’....We used them for our wedding. We’ll be using them whenever a rental is needed! I definitely recommend them, hands down service!!!!!!!!!!!

name: The Urban Woman
text: Great place, they literally have EVERYTHING!

name: Angela Washington
text: I absolutely love Evening Out!  I took my son to Men's Wearhouse and ordered a tux, but was prompted by my husband to check out EO.  We not only found the same tuxedo, but we paid far less and was not charged a rush fee, which Men's Wearhouse charges. The tux and accessories were ordered on Thursday morning and received Friday afternoon.  The measurements were exact and the service was superb.  We will definitely be back and will be referring our friends and family to do business with them.

name: Antonio Lucero
text: Professional and courteous.

name: Brock White
text: Great customer service, good quality suits, and great tuxedos.

name: William Headley
text: Professionalism at it's best here guys. Stop wasting your hard earned money on big name shops I.e. Men's wharehouse. Evening out has many more choices without the hassle of paying too much for that big name brand store. Don't worry if you need to call in your sizes as they are spot on with measurements. Nothing like great hometown service.

name: Courtney Salter
text: I love Evening Out!  Tuxedo Rental prices are very reasonable and is of great quality. Everyone their is so friendly, i felt at home. We must support our family owned businesses!

name: Zaron Johnson
text: Customer service so great, they came to the house to pick up the tuxedos. Everyone appreciated their professional politeness!!!

name: Robert McGhee
text: Nice family business that make the customer feel like they are a part of the family not just another dollar.

name: Mary PORTER
text: My son beautillion ball and  prom suits was topnotch💥💥💥

name: jarbarcus walker
text: Been supporting the business for years...since my Junior High school days @the old location and he also did my wedding in 2016 Excellent customer service !!! Not too mention CHEAPEST IN TOWN!!! he also offer alteration

name: IVRY HALL
text: Walked into evening out confused about a suit.. came back the next day looking like a million dollar man Thks to evening out

name: Debra Todd
text: Great staff. Fast. Great price

name: Jammie Lane
text: My wife and i chose Evening Out, because they offered the chocolate tuxedos we wanted. I must say Kem the owner is outstanding and had me as well as my groomsmen looking sharpe. We had so many compliments on the tux and the service we received was top notch. Certainly would recommend this business to anyone.  Thanks Kem for all of your help in making our day even more special with our looks.

name: Rahman Alexander
text: If you are looking for a reasonable price and quality tuxedo this is the place

name: Patty Mantell
text: Great customer service and a great price on a more fitted/custom tux for my son! I highly recommend An Evening Out!

name: Veronica Siler
text: Great place to get service from!!!! Gave me exactly what I wanted. I highly recommend it. Thanks Cheif from the Conner Wedding!!!!!

name: Marquie Fergerson
text: Guys there were kind of upper class. They acted kind of stuck up.

name: Tyreese Alford
text: If you are looking for a good and affordable tux rental evening out is that place

name: Raynard Dabney
text: Best tux shop in the city! Wonderful experience!

name: Kathy Lewis
text: Great customer service, very friendly

name: Sharose Talley
text: Friendly, professional. Great location

name: Angela Russell
text: Service is great and very helpful

name: curbie toles
text: Great customer service

name: beth sudsberry
text: Very helpful and wonderful people.

name: Saveon Cunningham
text: Made my military ball night the best

name: Charlie Brooks Jr
text: They Will Hook You Up!!!

name: Judon Roper
text: First class product and service

name: Scottie English
text: Nice clothes

name: Johnedo Bunch
text: Quick and convenient

name: Wendy Miles
text: Great customer service!!!

name: Juquincy Thompson
text: Happiness street

name: LaLa Weathersby
text: Fantastic service!!!!
